types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Schema defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, as well as the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: If this server supports subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: A list of all directives supported by this server.

types.name: __Type
types.description:
The fundamental unit of any GraphQL Schema is the type. There are many kinds of types in GraphQL as represented by the `__TypeKind` enum.

Depending on the kind of a type, certain fields describe information about that type. Scalar types provide no information beyond a name and description, while Enum types provide their values. Object and Interface types provide the fields they describe. Abstract types, Union and Interface, provide the Object types possible at runtime. List and NonNull types compose other types.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __Field
types.description: Object and Interface types are described by a list of Fields, each of which has a name, potentially a list of arguments, and a return type.

types.name: __InputValue
types.description: Arguments provided to Fields or Directives and the input fields of an InputObject are represented as Input Values which describe their type and optionally a default value.

fields.name: defaultValue
fields.description: A GraphQL-formatted string representing the default value for this input value.

types.name: __EnumValue
types.description: One possible value for a given Enum. Enum values are unique values, not a placeholder for a string or numeric value. However an Enum value is returned in a JSON response as a string.

types.name: __Directive
types.description:
A Directive provides a way to describe alternate runtime execution and type validation behavior in a GraphQL document.

In some cases, you need to provide options to alter GraphQL's execution behavior in ways field arguments will not suffice, such as conditionally including or skipping a field. Directives provide this by describing additional information to the executor.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: A Directive can be adjacent to many parts of the GraphQL language, a __DirectiveLocation describes one such possible adjacencies.

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a query operation.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a mutation operation.

enumValues.name: SUBSCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a subscription operation.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment definition.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a fragment spread.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an inline fragment.

enumValues.name: VARIABLE_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a variable definition.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a schema definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a scalar definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an object type definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a field definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an argument definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an interface definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to a union definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum definition

enumValues.name: ENUM_VALUE
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an enum value definition

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object type definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Location adjacent to an input object field definition.

fields.description: Get a list of all countries

fields.description: Get a classification

fields.description: Search for classifications within a domain

fields.name: domains
fields.description: Get a list of all domains

fields.name: languages
fields.description: Get a list of all languages

fields.description: Get a property

fields.name: referenceDocuments
fields.description: Get a list of all reference documents

fields.name: units
fields.description: Get a list of all units

fields.name: code
fields.description: Unique identification of the country

fields.name: name
fields.description: Country name

types.name: Classification
types.description: A classification can be any (abstract) object (e.g. “IfcWall”), abstract concept (e.g. “Costing”) or process (e.g. “Installation”). Classifications can be organized in a tree like structure. For example: “IfcCurtainWall” is a more specific classification of “IfcWall”. We use the term “parent” to identify this relation: the parent of “IfcCurtainWall” is “IfcWall”.

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: List of synonyms for the classification

fields.name: referenceCode
fields.description: Optional code for domain specific use

fields.name: property
fields.description: Select a property

fields.name: childs
fields.description: Include list of childs, with simple properties only. Only available when using the classification function with option 'includeChilds = true'.

fields.name: activationDateUtc
fields.description: Date of activation

fields.name: code
fields.description: Code used originally by the domain

fields.name: creatorLanguageCode
fields.description: Language code of the creator

fields.name: countriesOfUse
fields.description: List of countries where used

fields.name: countryOfOrigin
fields.description: Country of origin

fields.name: deActivationDateUtc
fields.description: Date of deactivation

fields.name: definition
fields.description: Definition

fields.name: deprecationExplanation
fields.description: Explanation of the deprecation

fields.name: documentReference
fields.description: Reference to a(n official) document

fields.name: name
fields.description: Plain name of the classification

fields.name: namespaceUri
fields.description: Unique identification of the classification

fields.name: replacedObjectCodes
fields.description: List of codes of the replaced items

fields.name: replacingObjectCodes
fields.description: List of codes of the replacing items

fields.name: revisionDateUtc
fields.description: Date of the revision

fields.name: revisionNumber

fields.name: status

fields.name: subdivisionsOfUse

fields.name: uid
fields.description: Alternative unique global identification

types.name: ClassificationProperty
types.description: Attributes of a property of a classification. A property can be part of many classifications but the restrictions for the property can differ per classification

fields.name: allowedValues
fields.description: List of allowed values

fields.name: dataType
fields.description: Format for expressing the value of the property: Boolean, Character, Date, Enumeration, Integer, Real, String, Time

fields.name: description
fields.description: Plain language description of the property

fields.name: dimension
fields.description:
Dimension of the physical quantity in format 'L M T I Θ N J', for example '-2 1 0 0 0 0 0'.
                                                  With
                                                    L   Length
                                                    M   Mass
                                                    T   Time
                                                    I   Electric current
                                                    Θ   Thermodynamic Temperature
                                                    N   Amount of substance
                                                    J   Luminous intensity

fields.name: dimensionLength
fields.description: The Length value of the dimension

fields.name: dimensionMass
fields.description: The Mass value of the dimension

fields.name: dimensionTime
fields.description: The Time value of the dimension

fields.name: dimensionElectricCurrent
fields.description: The Electric Current value of the dimension

fields.name: dimensionThermodynamicTemperature
fields.description: The Thermodynamic Temperature value of the dimension

fields.name: dimensionAmountOfSubstance
fields.description: The Amount Of Substance value of the dimension

fields.name: dimensionLuminousIntensity
fields.description: The Luminous Intensity value of the dimension

fields.name: dynamicParameterPropertyCodes
fields.description: List of codes of the properties which are parameters of the function for a dynamic property. Only applicable for dynamic properties (IsDynamic)

fields.name: example
fields.description: Illustrate possible use or values of the Property

fields.name: isDynamic
fields.description: True if the value of this property is dependent on other properties (as provided in DynamicParameterPropertyCodes)

fields.name: isRequired
fields.description: Indicates if the property is required to be filled for this classification

fields.name: isWritable
fields.description: Indicates if the property value can be changed

fields.name: maxExclusive
fields.description: Maximum value of the property, exclusive

fields.name: maxInclusive
fields.description: Maximum value of the property, inclusive

fields.name: methodOfMeasurement
fields.description: Description of the method of measurement

fields.name: minExclusive
fields.description: Minimum value of the property, exclusive

fields.name: minInclusive
fields.description: Minimum value of the property, inclusive

fields.name: pattern
fields.description: An XML Schema Regular expression for the property value. See for explanation: https://www.regular-expressions.info/xml.html.

fields.name: physicalQuantity
fields.description: The quantity in plain text

fields.name: possibleValues
fields.description: DEPRECATED - please use allowedValues instead

fields.name: predefinedValue
fields.description: Predefined value for the property

fields.name: propertySet
fields.description: Name of the property set

fields.name: propertyValueKind
fields.description: Indicates kind of value: Single, Range (2 values expected), List (multiple values expected), Complex (use in combination with ConnectedProperties), ComplexList

fields.name: symbol
fields.description: Symbol of the property

fields.name: textFormat
fields.description: The text type, e.g. UTF-8

fields.name: units
fields.description: List of units

fields.description: Date of activation

types.description: Attributes of possible values of a property of a classification.

fields.description: Globally unique identification of the property

fields.name: code
fields.description: Code of the value

fields.description: The value

fields.description: Sort number (if sorting of the values has been specified)

types.name: DateTime
types.description: The `DateTime` scalar type represents a date and time. `DateTime` expects timestamps to be formatted in accordance with the [ISO-8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) standard.

types.name: ClassificationRelation
types.description: Attributes of a relation of a classification with another classification, can be from a different domain.

fields.name: relatedClassificationUri
fields.description: The namespace uri of the related classification

types.name: Domain
types.description: Contains general information about the domain and the delivered data.

fields.description: The name of the domain

fields.name: version
fields.description: The version of the domain

fields.name: namespaceUri

fields.name: license

fields.description: The domain copyright

fields.name: moreInfoUrl

fields.name: lastUpdatedUtc
fields.description: UTC date this domain was last updated

fields.name: languageCode
fields.description: The language the results will be returned in if no language specified or if specified language is not available

fields.name: classificationSearch
fields.description: Search for classifications in the domain. Results are limited to max 5000 items.

types.name: PropertyValue
types.description: Attributes of possible values of a property.

fields.name: namespaceUri
fields.description: Globally unique identification of the property

fields.name: code
fields.description: Code of the value (unique within the property)

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the value

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value (unique within the property)

fields.name: sortNumber
fields.description: Sort number (if sorting of the values has been specified)

types.name: PropertyRelation
types.description: Attributes of a relation of a property with another property, can be from a different domain.

fields.description: Name of the related property

fields.name: relatedPropertyUri
fields.description: The namespace uri of the related property

fields.name: relationType
fields.description: Type of the relation with the reference property

fields.description: Unique identification of the reference document

fields.name: name
fields.description: Reference document name

fields.name: date
fields.description: Reference document date

fields.name: code
fields.description: Unique identification of the unit

fields.name: name
fields.description: Unit name

fields.name: symbol
fields.description: Unit symbol

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the 'if' argument is true.

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the 'if' argument is true.

directives.name: deprecated
directives.description: Marks an element of a GraphQL schema as no longer supported.

args.name: reason
args.description: Explains why this element was deprecated, usually also including a suggestion for how to access supported similar data. Formatted in [Markdown](https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/).
